creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: bowl, with raised foot and turned back rim, decorated in underglaze blue; four sprays of flowers on exterior of bowl; interior shows two birds under peony tree (symbol of spring) enclosed in circle of conventionalized arabesques and flowers; sprays of flowers above this; conventionalized repeat motif on rim, with wide band of flowers and designs immediately below
dimension: 4 1/8 x 10 x 10 in. (10.5 x 25.4 x 25.4 cm) (diameter, top)
title: Bowl
